Name: Base Station Renewal, New Relampago Car Service, Brooklyn
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of the application of  New Relampago Car Service for the renewal of a license to operate a base station in the borough of Brooklyn.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section one. The application of  New Relampago Car Service for the renewal of a license to operate a base station at 499 Grand Street in the borough of Brooklyn, which application was approved by the taxi and limousine commission, is hereby approved. 
      ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately. 



LS#40
01/15/98
